title: Structuring Your Data Story
text: Telling your audience what to do next is always a good idea to guide future action.

title: Impact of Story Frameworks
text: Think about what element gives direction and steps to the presentation.

title: Logical Flow
text: A data presentation should be able to flow from one idea to the next without including contrasting statements.

title: Ending Statement
text: At the end of the presentation, it is best to lead into future plans rather than going back on continuing stories with "Meanwhile."
